FuncDef:
The set e1-drive-mode command configures a drive output mode for an E1 subcard.
The undo set said-node command restores the default configuration.
By default, the drive output mode of an E1 subcard is default.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the drive of an E1 subcard is in default mode.
-

Sets the drive output mode of an E1 subcard to high waveform.
-

Sets the drive output mode of an E1 subcard to low waveform.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When you test the drive output mode of an E1 subcard, if the output waveform and meter template do not match, run the set e1-drive-mode command to modify the drive output mode.
